do the first half of the clone procedure copy the debs out of /var/cache/apt/archives , save them somewhere. Do the install, copy them back. then do the second half of the clone procedure
when you clone, it just takes the names of the packages. So, when you tell it to do the dselect-upgrade, it will use the latest update available
